multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Free Spin Scatter symbols, Diamond Scatter symbols, and Snake Wild symbols.
3 Free Spin Scatter symbols trigger the free spins. Choose one of the three free spin modes to start the bonus. 3 Scatter symbols pay bet x2.
Any time the Ape appears, he leaves one or more Wild symbols which are locked in their position for the remainder of the Free Spins.

Collect the Diamond Progress Scatter symbol to make regular symbols turn into Wild symbols for all remaining free spins. Collect 7 Diamonds for 2 extra spins. Collect 11 Diamonds for 2 additional spins.
The Snake Feature is triggered by the Snake wild symbol appearing anywhere on the first and last reel. The snake will slither between the Snake symbols leaving Wild symbols near its trail.
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active betline is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
CLICK ON A SHIP TO CHOOSE YOUR FREE SPINS!
COLLECT DIAMONDS TO ENABLE EXTRA WILDS

Sinbad
About the game Sinbad is a 5 reel, 3x4x4x4x3, 40 bet line video slot. The game features Stacked Symbols, and three different Free Spins Bonuses: Ape Free Spins, Roc Free Spins, and Snake Free Spins. Theoretical payout is 97.08%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow these 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN symbol button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the Total Bet by clicking on the display and choosing the total bet of your choice. The TOTAL BET is based on the bet per line multiplied by the number of active win lines which is fixed at 40. The number of bet lines used in the game can be changed by clicking on the BET LINES display.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field. All wins are multiplied by the bet per line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically. Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the bottom left of the game you can choose: - Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
- Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The game has five different types of Wild Symbols: Stacked Wilds substitute for all symbols except Free Spin Scatter symbols, Diamond Scatter symbols, and Snake Wild symbols. Ape Wild. Appears in Ape Free Spins and once awarded stays locked until the free spins bonus ends. Extra wilds (including Sinbad wild, Sheheradze wild, and Khalif wild), appear in Roc Free Spins. Medium win symbols (Sinbad, Sheheradze, and the Khalif) may change into wild symbols and remain wild for the rest of the free spins bonus. Extra Wilds substitute for all symbols except Diamond Scatter symbol. Snake Wilds appear on 1st and 5th reels in Snake Free Spins. Snake Wilds also triggers the Snake feature. Slither wilds appear in the Snake Free Spins when the Snake feature occurs.
Scatter Symbols Scatter symbols are not bound to bet lines. The game has two different Scatter symbols: Free Spins Scatter symbol. Appear in Main game. Three or more Free Spins Scatter symbols initiate the Free Spins Bonus. Three Scatter pay bet x 2 Diamond Scatter symbol. Appear in Roc Free Spins. Collecting Diamond Scatter symbols enables Extra Wilds.
Game Features Stacked Symbols A different set of stacked symbols is selected each spin. All symbols can be stacked except for Free spin Scatter symbol, Diamond Scatter symbol, Snake Wild symbol, Ape Wild symbol, and Snake slither wild.
Free Spins 3 Free Spin Scatter symbols initiates the Free Spins feature. Player chooses between three different free spin bonuses: Ape Free Spins. Every time the Ape appears and smashes the reels, one or more locked wild symbols will be awarded. The locked wild symbols will remain locked for the rest of the free spins bonus. Roc Free Spins. Collect Diamond Scatter symbols to get extra wild symbols and extra free spins. Collect 3 Diamond symbols to get the first extra wild (Sinbad), an additional 4 Diamond symbols awards the second extra wild (Sheheradze) and 2 extra spins, an additional 4 Diamond symbols awards the third extra wild (Khalif) and 2 extra spins. Snake Free Spins. A Snake Wild symbol on the first and the fifth real awards the Snake feature for that spin. A snake slithers over the game leaving wild symbols near its trail
Malfunction in the game voids all pays.
